Title: Jennifer Rohn
Abstract: © 2015 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.An interview with Jennifer Rohn, who, in addition to running a lab studying chronic urinary tract infections, is involved in public engagement activities and lobbying for protection of UK research funding.
